channel.title: Javac: file not found error
channel.description:
Here is my error. I am coding the iQuality source.
javac: file not found: src\server\model\players\content\Teleporting\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Compiler: [code]@echo off title Running Compiler.. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\model\players\content\Teleporting\*.java src\server\model\combat\*.java src\server\model\players\content\randomevents\*.java src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\content\bankpin\*.java src\server\model\players\content\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause[/code]
I am sure that the folder has the file too and my .classpath and .project are in the same folder as the compiler. Please, I'm desperate :(

item.title: Javac: file not found error
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

The links are fixed. If you understood the language, you would know how packages work. So good day to you sir.

Read full topic

item.title: Javac: file not found error
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

Please, the links don’t even work. Plus, I understand the language all too well, just can’t execute them effectively. Where should I start editting?

Read full topic

item.title: Javac: file not found error
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Java is case-sensitive. Check to see if the “Teleporting” package is capitalized. Also, to help you learn download this, http://eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-developers/indigosr2 It will help you to understand errors more…

Also, http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/reallybigindex.html Just to help you learn the language.

Read full topic

item.title: Javac: file not found error
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

How would I redirect it? I clearly see 3 .java files in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Javac: file not found error
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

file not found: src\server\model\players\content\Teleporting*.java

Pretty self-explanatory.

Read full topic

item.title: Javac: file not found error

item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

Here is my error. I am coding the iQuality source.

javac: file not found: src\server\model\players\content\Teleporting*.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

Compiler:

@echo off title Running Compiler.. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\model\players\content\Teleporting\*.java src\server\model\combat\*.java src\server\model\players\content\randomevents\*.java src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\content\bankpin\*.java src\server\model\players\content\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

I am sure that the folder has the file too and my .classpath and .project are in the same folder as the compiler. Please, I’m desperate
